channel.title: Google on Minko Gechev's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Google on Minko Gechev's blog

item.title: Joining Google
item.description: The past five years I’ve been heavily involved in the startup space, both, here in the Silicon Valley and Bulgaria. My focus was EdTech, working on different educational products, starting with an app for kids, to a platform for online education, marketing, and sales demos which provides access to a virtual environment in the browser. In the second company called Rhyme, which is particularly exciting and technically challenging, I had the opportunity to join as a co-founder.
